name: Endurance
description: Endurance governs resisting various types of effects and exhaustion. It is the attribute that determines how hard you can get hit and how much stamina you have.

name: Strength
description: Strength determines how strong your body is, and the maximum output of your muscles. This effects how hard you can hit.

name: Accuracy
description: Accuracy primarily effects the use of both physical and ranged weapons, as well as some forms of arcane systems. This attribute effects your ability to hit a target.

name: Dexterity
description: Dexterity directly influences your ability to dodge attacks. It effects your ability to ride and steer a variety of vehicles and creatures, and the intricate use of your hands to create art and tech.

name: Perception
description: Perception governs your body's senses and reaction time. It effects your ability to track a target and how long it takes you to find what you are searching for.

name: Charisma
description: Charisma is the attribute that deals with relating to others. High charisma will enable you to persuade, deceive, or romance just about anyone.

name: Heart
description: Heart determines your intrapersonal skills. Your strength of will, your faith in your beliefs, your moral fortitude, and spiritual power.

name: Intelligence
description: Intelligence represents your academic learning, and the application of knowledge. It also reflects your ability to cast spells that require an intricate understanding of the laws of nature.

name: Wisdom
description: Wisdom governs the skills learned through experiencing life and overcoming hardships. This influences your ability to cast spells that require intuition over intellect.
